data.title: The University Club at Arlington
data.text:
Facilities

Swim with a view! Our aquatics complex overlooks the golf course and our sparkling 16-acre lake. A 279,000 gallon, Olympic-sized main pool ranges in depth from 3’6” to 12’6.” There are two one-meter diving boards and dedicated lap lanes for fitness swimming.

With plenty of lounge chairs, large umbrellas, and canopies, the pool is a family-friendly center for recreation and relaxation as well as a training facility for competitive swimmers. The wading pool provides a reassuring zero-depth and beach-type entry for our youngest members to enjoy. We offer a concessions stand with snacks, slushies, ice creams, hot food from the grill, and a fully stocked bar.

We offer birthday pool party packages for members that include use of the patio area, as well as one drink per person. Contact Taylor Lewis at 859-622-2201

or via email at [email protected] to schedule your child's birthday party.

Daily Pool Hours

The Pool will be open Friday of Memorial Day Weekend through Monday of Labor Day Weekend. See below for hours.

Hours are subject to change without notice.

Concession stand closes 1 hour prior to pool closing time.

Please note that food is not allowed on the pool deck and drinks are not allowed in the pool.

Summer Hours

Monday-Thursday | 11:00am - 8:00pm

Friday | 11:00am - 10:00pm

Saturday | 11:00am - 8:00pm

Sunday | 1:00pm - 8:00pm

School in Session Hours

Monday-Thursday | 4:00pm - 8:00pm

Friday | 4:00pm - 10:00pm

Saturday | 11:00am - 8:00pm

Sunday | 1:00pm - 8:00p

Pool Check-In Policy

All members and guests must check-in with the attendant before entering the pool deck. Membership card is required for entry for each member in attendance, children included. Guests must be accompanied by a member and register by filling out a guest check-in form.

If you have any questions or concerns regarding the operations of the pool, please contact our administrative office at 859-622-2200.

Click here to view our calendar of events, including pool activities.
